mapper.select: SELECT (select dict_label from js_sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'aa_defect_status_code' and dict_value = cbk.state) as state, (select name from aa_picture_type where id = cbk.technology_info_id) as projectName, technology_info_id as project,description FROM `aa_check_body_skeleton` cbk where cbk.exam_user_id = #{examUserId}
